identity.mission: Create a top 1% sports-tech interface that blends broadcast graphics with SaaS precision.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Sports Broadcast x SaaS Productivity x Streetwear.
Emotion First: Every screen feels like 'Game Time'.
Content is King: Data is the hero, UI is the stadium.
Zoom In: Bold focus on player stats and details.
Negative Space: Breathing room for high-density data.

headings.usage: Hero titles, section headers, player numbers, key stats.

body.usage: Paragraphs, form labels, table data, UI elements.

grids.bento: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-4 md:gap-6

buttons.primary: bg-[#0134bd] hover:bg-[#0134bd]/90 text-white font-bold uppercase tracking-wide rounded-md shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(1,52,189,0.5)] transition-all hover:scale-105
buttons.secondary: bg-[#fb6c1d] hover:bg-[#fb6c1d]/90 text-white font-bold uppercase tracking-wide rounded-md shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(251,108,29,0.5)] transition-all hover:scale-105
buttons.outline: border-2 border-white/20 hover:border-white text-white bg-transparent font-bold uppercase tracking-wide rounded-md transition-all

inputs.base: bg-[#0b0b0b] border border-white/20 text-white placeholder:text-white/30 focus:border-[#fb6c1d] focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#fb6c1d] rounded-md h-12 px-4 transition-all

badges.base: inline-flex items-center px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-bold uppercase tracking-wide

assets.icons: Use Lucide React icons. Stroke width: 1.5px for elegance, 2px for UI controls.

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use gradients for text unless it's a massive headline.
DO NOT use pure black (#000000). Use #0b0b0b or #121212.
Use 'Barlow Condensed' for all headings to maintain brand identity.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast (WCAG AA).
Mobile-first: Intake form must be thumb-friendly (44px+ touch targets).
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a high-performance sports-tech app. Stick to the dark theme. Use the provided image URLs for backgrounds and placeholders. Implement the 'Bento' grid for the dashboard. Use Shadcn components but override their styles with the classes defined in 'components' section. Prioritize the 'Barlow Condensed' font for headings to give it that sports-media look.
